## Procedures.ObservableProcedureMap class

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ObservableProcedureMap extends Map<string, IProcedureModel> implements IProcedureMap 
```
**Extends:** Map&lt;string, [IProcedureModel](./blockly.procedures.iproceduremodel.md)<!-- -->&gt;

**Implements:** [IProcedureMap](./blockly.procedures.iproceduremap.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `ObservableProcedureMap` class.

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [add(proc)](./blockly.procedures.observableproceduremap.add.md) |  | Adds the given ProcedureModel to the map of procedure models, so that blocks can find it. |
|  [clear()](./blockly.procedures.observableproceduremap.clear.md) |  | Removes all ProcedureModels from the procedure map. |
|  [delete(id)](./blockly.procedures.observableproceduremap.delete.md) |  | Deletes the ProcedureModel with the given ID from the procedure map (if it exists). |
|  [getProcedures()](./blockly.procedures.observableproceduremap.getprocedures.md) |  | Returns all of the procedures stored in this map. |
|  [set(id, proc)](./blockly.procedures.observableproceduremap.set.md) |  | Adds the given procedure model to the procedure map. |
